revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Map spot | name = Sector Action: "Eyes Go Below Ceiling" | class = SecActEyesBelowC | doomednum = 9983 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SectorAction|SectorAction]]→SecActEyesBelowC
This is a [[Transfer_Heights]]-specific thing that triggers its special when a player's viewpoint go below the fake ceiling of the sector it is in. See also: [[Thing executed specials]] ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SecActEyesBelowC : {{Class|SectorAction}} native {}
